title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: Another suspected case of African swine fever has been reported Sunday at a farm in Pocheon, Gyeonggi-do Province..Quarantine personnel have been sent to disinfect the area and restrict the movement of people and vehicles.If confirmed, the case would be the 14th outbreak of African swine fever in Korea, despite massive government efforts to prevent the disease from spreading.A 48-hour standstill order that was issued to all farms in Gyeonggi-do, Gangwon-do provinces and Incheon City had been lifted as of 3:30 am Sunday.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
